message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its quality and potential.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $14,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price point acknowledges its worth while offering you a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $15,000. Can you meet me at this price?
